abstract: Tells StoreKit to ask the user to rate or review your app, if appropriate.
overview:
## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. SwiftUI calls it when you call the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/RequestReviewAction] instance that you get from the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/requestReview] environment value.

For information about how Swift uses the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/RequestReviewAction/callAsFunction()]method to simplify call site syntax, see [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Declarations.html#ID622] in *The Swift Programming Language*.

# callAsFunction()

**Instance Method**

Tells StoreKit to ask the user to rate or review your app, if appropriate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func callAsFunction()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. SwiftUI calls it when you call the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/RequestReviewAction] instance that you get from the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/requestReview] environment value.

For information about how Swift uses the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/RequestReviewAction/callAsFunction()]method to simplify call site syntax, see [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Declarations.html#ID622] in *The Swift Programming Language*.
title: callAsFunction()
